thread.section_title: CarTrawler Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CarTrawler | www.cartrawler.com | 34 of 805
thread.title: Jim Gibb

author: Jim Gibb
title: Jim Gibb
text:
I waited a long time for the car, possibly longer than 25 minutes but after a flight everything seems long. The staff were polite and the car perfect.
Only criticism would be queuing in the same queue as people hiring, would be better to have returns separately dealt with which would cut queues and encourage return custom.
Overall a good deal and well treated by the staff.
